sentences.en: ...grease-stained hands.
sentences.cn: …沾满了油渍的手。

sentences.en: Don't grease the affected part.
sentences.cn: 不要用油脂涂抹患处.

sentences.en: Gasoline cuts oil and grease.
sentences.cn: 汽油溶解油脂.

sentences.en: Gasoline is a solvent liquid which removes grease spots.
sentences.cn: 汽油是一种能去掉油污的有溶解力的液体.

sentences.en: Grease 6 ramekin dishes of 150 ml (5-6 fl oz) capacity.
sentences.cn: 将6个容量为150毫升（5至6液盎司）的烤盘涂上油。

sentences.en: Grease marks can be removed with liquid detergent.
sentences.cn: 用洗涤液可除去油渍。

sentences.en: Grease two sturdy baking sheets and heat the oven to 400 degrees.
sentences.cn: 在两块结实的烤板上抹些油，把烤炉加热到400度。

sentences.en: he leaped over the tailboard of the lorry like greased lightning.
sentences.cn: 他闪电般跃过卡车后挡板。

sentences.en: He puts grease on his hair to make It'shiny.
sentences.cn: 他往头发上擦油,使之发亮.

sentences.en: He wiped away the grease from the windshield of the car.
sentences.cn: 他擦去了汽车挡风玻璃上的油渍.

sentences.en: His hair is thick with grease.
sentences.cn: 他的头发油腻腻的。

sentences.en: his mission was to use his budgetary skills to grease the skids for new projects.
sentences.cn: 他的任务是运用预算能力使新项目顺利进行。

sentences.en: I greased front and rear hubs and adjusted the brakes.
sentences.cn: 我把前后轮轴都加了润滑油并调试了刹车。

sentences.en: It removes deeply embedded dirt and grease so allowing your horse's skin to breathe more easily.
sentences.cn: 它可以清除厚积的尘垢和油脂,让马的皮肤更加自在地呼吸.

sentences.en: It took a considerable amount of polish and elbow grease before the brass shone like new.
sentences.cn: 经过大量的抛光和擦拭，黄铜光亮如新。

sentences.en: Oil and grease will rot the rubber of the tyre.
sentences.cn: 油污会腐蚀轮胎的橡胶.

sentences.en: plates covered with grease
sentences.cn: 油腻的盘子

sentences.en: The clothes are stained with grease.
sentences.cn: 衣服被油脂渍住了.

sentences.en: The floor was covered in grease and filth.
sentences.cn: 地板上满是油垢和污物。

sentences.en: The wallpaper was streaky with grease.
sentences.cn: 壁纸上道道油渍。

sentences.en: You have a grease spot on your shirt.
sentences.cn: 你的衬衣上有块油斑.

words.tran_cn: 润滑器；润滑工；加油脂或涂油脂的工人

phrases.phrase: grease (someone's) palm 或 grease (someone's) hand &I{【俚语】}

phrases.tran_cn: n. 滑脂润滑；油脂润滑
(北美，非正式)使事情顺利进行
高温润滑脂；高温润滑油

trans.tran_cn: 动物油脂，油膏，润滑油，〈俚〉贿赂
trans.tran_en: a fatty or oily substance that comes off meat when it is cooked, or off food made using butter or oil
to put butter, grease etc on a pan etc to prevent food from sticking to it

trans.tran_cn: 涂油脂于，用油脂润滑，贿赂
trans.tran_en: to put butter, grease etc on a pan etc to prevent food from sticking to it
